ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: The xlsxjars package collects all the external jars required for the xlxs package. This release corresponds to POI 3.10.1.
The xlsxjars package collects all the external jars required for the xlxs package. This release corresponds to POI 3.10.1.

name: r-xlsxjars
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.9.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-xlsxjars
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/xlsxjars_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/xlsxjars/xlsxjars_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4840093e9faf78b60540153ca9284a55e325bd0c7842aa66b6572af423eeebc0

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rjava
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rjava

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('xlsxjars')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('xlsxjars')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=xlsxjars
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: The xlsxjars package collects all the external jars required for the xlxs package. This release corresponds to POI 3.10.1.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: xlsxjars
# Type: Package
# Title: Package required POI jars for the xlsx package
# Version: 0.6.1
# Date: 2014-08-21
# Depends: rJava
# LazyLoad: yes
# Authors@R: c(person(c("Adrian", "A."), "Dragulescu",  role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "adrian.dragulescu@gmail.com"),  person("The Apache Software Foundation",  role = c("ctb", "cph"),  comment = "Apache POI, Apache XMLBeans", "Apache Commons Codec"),  person("MetaStuff, Ltd.",  role = c("ctb", "cph"), comment = "Dom4j"))
# Description: The xlsxjars package collects all the external jars required for the xlxs package. This release corresponds to POI 3.10.1.
# License: GPL-3
# Copyright: See file COPYRIGHTS
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
